channel.title: Making Fresh Server Team! - Must Look
channel.description:
Hey, Ever wanted a partner to make a server with you? Alwayz wanted your server to stay up? Or was it that you came here to join my new team? Well I'll tell ya about this team! We are going to have a fresh team, [b]no special people needed[/b] at all just let me tell you about this here young fella (rofl).
[b]Note[/b] - [b]These jobs will tell you what you need to do if your in the team.[/b] [b]Note[/b] - [b]A Max of all the below will be excepted, but for game mod, we allow all of you to be one (If your in the team).[/b]
Apply For Coding [b]10 is the max of coders[/b] In this coding team you are suppose to code the ducuments of the server (will have a name soon) allowing you to make the game much better for other players of moparscape. In order to learn new codes you must go to (coming soon) to learn codes about runescape.
[b]Application[/b] Name: Coding type? Teleport Maker, Command Maker, Skill Makers. Code Skill? Beginner, Coder, Advanced Game Name?
[b]Applying For Webmaster[/b] You will work on the website doing HTML, Css, Javascripts ect. Allowing others to play the game while its is online.
[b]Application[/b] Name: Web Job: Art, Html skills,
[b]Applying For Game Mod[/b] If you wish to play the game making sure nothing happens, please become one now as we will need you to look for bugs at all cost in order to make the game safer.
Name:
[b]Do not flame this forum or I will have you removed as soon as possible.[/b][br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 05:19:34 PM[/size][hr]Please post - Need opinions and comments
Thank You Very Much
[b]|\/\/| A.K | Reporter Of Your Life Now |\/\/|[/b]
